msContents.summary: Fragments of Genesis, Exodus, Numbers and Deuteronomy, with the Arabic translation of the Karaite Yeshuʿah ben 'Ari or al-Shaikh Abu 'l-Faraj Furḳan ibn Asad; fragments of Genesis with the Arabic translation of the Karaite Japhet ben Ali.
